trans:
Hello.
I am in charge of ZEROBASEONE.
This is the guide for ZEROBASEONE's Macau face-to-face fan signing event, part of their Asian Tour to celebrate the release of their 4th Mini Album [ğ‚ğˆğğ„ğŒğ€ ğğ€ğ‘ğ€ğƒğˆğ’ğ„].
For those who wish to participate, please review the information below.
ZEROBASEONE â”‚ The 4th Mini Album [ğ‚ğˆğğ„ğŒğ€ ğğ€ğ‘ğ€ğƒğˆğ’ğ„] Information on the fan signing event in Macau to celebrate the Asian Tour album release.
1. Yeti Mall
- Event Participation Sales Period: From 12:00 PM (CST) on Tuesday, October 1, 2024, to 11:59 PM (CST) on Sunday, October 6, 2024.
- Where to buy: Yeti Mall
- Number of winners: Team A: 50 signers / Team B: 50 spectators
- Date and time of the face-to-face event: 3:00 PM (CST) on Monday, November 4, 2024, in Macau. The event venue and specific details for winners will be provided later.
* Important Notice
1. If you are found to be involved in fraudulent activities, such as transferring or selling admission tickets for the signing event, you may face disadvantages at future artist events.
2. The winning ticket for the fan signing event is non-transferable under any circumstances.
3. If you participate in the fan signing event using someone else's name, you will be removed immediately upon discovery.
4. If you enter the event after drinking, you may be subject to entry restrictions.
5. SNS live streaming (such as Instagram Live, Facebook Live, YouTube Live, etc.) is strictly prohibited at the fan signing event.
6. Seat changes are not allowed after entry. Changing seats during the fan signing or making unnecessary movements is prohibited.
7. Seat exchanges with other attendees are not allowed. You must remain in your assigned seat and are not permitted to move to another seat or set up a tripod in a different location.
